Set.Text: The Samurai are the Japanese unique unit, replacing the Longswordsman. The Samurai is available earlier than the Longswordsman. Samurai have a bonus when defending against ranged attacks, and their combat generates twice the usual number of points toward Great Generals. Embarked Samurai can build Fishing Boats in one turn without being consumed, which makes them useful even in times of peace.

Powerful Medieval infantry Unit. Only the Japanese may build it. This Unit defends more effectively against ranged attacks and helps produce Great Generals more quickly than the Longswordsman, which it replaces. Embarked Samurai can build Fishing Boats in one turn without being consumed.
